title: 11 Ways a Taurus Man Expresses Love

steps.title: A Taurus in love won't be able to get enough of you!
steps.content: A Taurus in love won't be able to get enough of you! Taurus values connection and communication, so he'll spend every free moment with you. If you can't meet up, you're messaging back and forth or making plans for the next time you can see each other. These are great signs that he's serious about you. [1] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Taurus is a homebody, so if he's willing to come over and meet up, he's definitely interested.

steps.title: A Taurus in love makes you feel like the most special person in the world.
steps.content: A Taurus in love makes you feel like the most special person in the world. He has a way of being thoughtful and sweet to someone he loves. Since his sign is ruled by Venus, the planet of beauty, he'll notice a new outfit you're wearing, or point out that he likes the new way you're styling your hair. He'll also point out personality traits that he likes about you. For instance, he might say, "You're so good at putting everyone at ease. People genuinely enjoy your company," or, "I really like that color on you. It brings out the green in your eyes."

steps.title: Taurus's ruling planet Venus is all about romance.
steps.content: Taurus's ruling planet Venus is all about romance. You'll find your guy splurging on thoughtful gifts or taking you to nice restaurants. This sign really values material things and sensual experiences. He'll overwhelm you with nice things or trips because it's his way of showing his affection. For instance, you might mention that you love Vietnamese food. The next time you meet up, he'll surprise you with a reservation at the restaurant with the best pho in town.

steps.title: Taurus is a very sensual sign, so he'll make lots of physical contact.
steps.content: Taurus is a very sensual sign, so he'll make lots of physical contact. [2] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. If he feels a bond with you, he'll reach out and touch you—he'll brush against your shoulder, hold hands, rub your back, etc. Taurus is a very touchy-feely type, especially when he's in love. In bed, Taurus isn't an overly sexual sign, although he's really into foreplay.

steps.title: A Taurus will make you the center of his world when he's in love.
steps.content: A Taurus will make you the center of his world when he's in love. It's a good sign if your Taurus smiles frequently, holds your gaze for several moments, or always glances at you to see your reaction to something. He'll also keep his body turned toward you. His body language makes it clear that he's comfortable with you. [3] X Research source You may also catch him grooming himself around you—brushing a hair off his sleeve, straightening his shirt, or quickly checking his appearance in the mirror. He does this because he wants you to think the best about him.

steps.title: Taurus is a sign driven by routine, so he wants to know how you operate.
steps.content: Taurus is a sign driven by routine, so he wants to know how you operate. If your guy loves you, he wants to know what makes you tick—what are your habits and preferences? He'll ask you to share lots of details, so he can make you comfortable as your routines merge. He'll also include you in decision-making. This shows that he truly values your input and that you're becoming an important part of his life.

steps.title: Taurus wants you to be part of his social life if he cares about you.
steps.content: Taurus wants you to be part of his social life if he cares about you. Your Taurus guy has a small social circle. [4] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. When he introduces you, it's because he wants you to become part of his world. He values their opinions about you, and he hopes that you'll hit it off with his friends. If it seems like meeting his friends is a big deal to him, it's because it is! Talk to his friends, so you really get to know them. If you're comfortable with his friends, it will put your Taurus guy at ease.

steps.title: A Taurus in love can't help that he gets territorial.
steps.content: A Taurus in love can't help that he gets territorial. Some Taurus guys can get noticeably protective—your man might swoop in and interrupt a conversation you're having with another man. Others mention their concern privately. For instance, your guy might say something like, "I noticed you talked with Frank a lot tonight." This is your guy's way of showing that he wants you to be his.

steps.title: Your man talks about practicalities because he wants to take care of you.
steps.content: Your man talks about practicalities because he wants to take care of you. Since Taurus is an Earth sign, he's logical. He'll pick your brain about your finances or career. Then, he'll take steps to help you become secure. For instance, if he learns that you hate paying bills, he may offer to sit down with you every month and do them. Taurus is the sign of material possessions, so it's no surprise that he wants to help you manage your resources and finances.

steps.title: Your Taurus man becomes noticeably confident if he's in love.
steps.content: Your Taurus man becomes noticeably confident if he's in love. Think back to when you first started talking with him—he was probably shy and even a little awkward. He probably let you take the lead in conversation. Now that he feels safe and loved, he'll act bolder. He'll act flirtier and tease you if he's confident in his feelings for you. For instance, he doesn't appear nervous or quiet around you anymore. Plus, he's dropped any awkward mannerisms he may have shown early in your relationship.

steps.title: When a Taurus man is in love, your relationship will be his top priority.
steps.content: When a Taurus man is in love, your relationship will be his top priority. You'll never see him flirting or chatting up other people because he only has eyes for you! Taurus is a fixed earth sign. [5] X Expert Source Jessica Lanyadoo Astrologer & Psychic Medium Expert Interview. 12 November 2019. Earth signs are grounded and fixed signs tend to be focused and determined. This unique combination means Taurus values stability in a relationship.
